To clean the `office`, `category`, `program`, and `purpose` variables, run the scripts in this order: 

- `supermdat_general_exploration/2017-05-07__supermdat__GeneralCleanAndStandardize.Rmd`  
- `supermdat_general_exploration/2017-05-07__supermdat__CleanChrVars_Office.Rmd`
- `supermdat_general_exploration/2017-05-07__supermdat__CleanChrVars_Category.Rmd`
- `supermdat_general_exploration/Variable Cleaning/2017-05-21__supermdat__CleanChrVars_Program.Rmd`
- `supermdat_general_exploration/2017-06-09__supermdat__CleanChrVars_Purpose.Rmd`
